key_risks: Regulatory and compliance risks, including audits and investigations related to Medicaid and Medicare compliance
Dependence on government programs, with potential impact from changes in healthcare policies or reimbursement rates
Legal and operational challenges, including lawsuits and high member churn rates
Market and competitive pressures in the managed care sector
controversies: $4.625 million False Claims Act settlement for violating regulations related to staff licensure and supervision
Class action lawsuit (*Figueroa v. Molina Healthcare*) alleging non-compliance with Medicaid payment regulations
social_issues: Grievances related to quality of care and claims processing, impacting member satisfaction and retention
Focus on low-income and underserved populations, exposing the company to heightened regulatory and social scrutiny
governance_issues: Regulatory scrutiny and compliance issues, including a civil money penalty (CMP) of $43,884 for issues with Medicare-Medicaid Plan (MMP) contracts
